Translations.Text: lilladhina ahsanu l-hus'na waziyadatun wala yarhaqu wujuhahum qatarun wala dhillatun ulaika ashabu l-janati hum fiha khaliduna

wa-alladhina kasabu l-sayiati jazau sayyi-atin bimith'liha watarhaquhum dhillatun ma lahum mina l-lahi min ʿasimin ka-annama ugh'shiyat wujuhuhum qitaʿan mina al-layli muz'liman ulaika ashabu l-nari hum fiha khaliduna
wayawma nahshuruhum jamiʿan thumma naqulu lilladhina ashraku makanakum antum washurakaukum fazayyalna baynahum waqala shurakauhum ma kuntum iyyana taʿbuduna
fakafa bil-lahi shahidan baynana wabaynakum in kunna ʿan ʿibadatikum laghafilina
hunalika tablu kullu nafsin ma aslafat waruddu ila l-lahi mawlahumu l-haqi wadalla ʿanhum ma kanu yaftaruna

qul man yarzuqukum mina l-samai wal-ardi amman yamliku l-samʿa wal-absara waman yukh'riju l-haya mina l-mayiti wayukh'riju l-mayita mina l-hayi waman yudabbiru l-amra fasayaquluna l-lahu faqul afala tattaquna
fadhalikumu l-lahu rabbukumu l-haqu famadha baʿda l-haqi illa l-dalalu fa-anna tus'rafuna
kadhalika haqqat kalimatu rabbika ʿala alladhina fasaqu annahum la yu'minuna
